title: BUSINESS CHECK (MARKER) - SECLI UK - RESTORE CHECKS AFTER COPY FROM Prod Like TO SECLI Test

task_list.instruction_title:
Business checks on SECLI Test, before starting Client integration.
Look for the Marker (for client) added on PROD Like. The same marker should be visible on Test Environment - GVA
Check same Marker on London (302 and 303)
Check same Marker on Jersey (304 and 305)
